add.lore: The intersection of what can be and what is. The apotheosis of being. Shear away the unclean, the impure, the rotten; leave only the raw, blinding truth of the self.
Hidden amongst the foundations of the Expanse are anomalous fragments wrapped in an otherworldly power. While unsettling to the touch, the strength they impart is too tempting to ignore.

majorIds.Spectral Memory: +Spectral Memory: Ghostly Trigger lasts until landing, but no longer increases attack speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 33%.

add.lore: Your mind is falling apart, the pieces scattering, your grasp on reality weakening, your soul an empty space. I shall fill it.

majorIds.Evershot: +Evershot: Arrow Hurricane becomes a consistent, straight stream of arrows with a slower fire rate, dealing greater knockback and triple damage per arrow.

add.lore: Warning - device in state of extreme disrepair. Operators may experience unstable output, resulting in severe heat production upsurges. Any damage to material will not be reimbursed, and users will not be compensated for any injuries, burns, or deaths caused by improper use.

majorIds.Twisting Threads: +Twisting Threads: Tangled Traps ropes gain +1 range, can overlap up to 3 times, and deal 30%. Gain +12 traps with 66% duration that cannot be triggered by enemies.

before.lore: Left. Right. Left. Right. They are desperate for an escape, merely playthings in a maze of your design. Left. Left. Right.  Turn back. When mountains of stone can shift at your command, their world is reduced to a single path. Left. Right. Does it ever end?

majorIds.Twisting Threads: +Twisting Threads: Tangled Traps ropes gain +1 range, can overlap up to 3 times, and deal 50%. Gain +12 traps with 66% duration that cannot be triggered by enemies.

after.lore: Left. Right. Left. Right. They are desperate for an escape, merely playthings in a maze of your design. Left. Left. Right.  Turn back. When mountains of stone can shift at your command, their world is reduced to a single path. Left. Right. Does it ever end?

majorIds.Lifestream: +Lifestream: Blood Sorrow deals 400% and grants 4 times the overhealth, but shortens its duration by 75%.

before.lore: The power to join oneself with the lifeblood of the earth has long eluded sects of fanatical druids and shamans. One such cult found a way, and subsequently wiped itself out in the process, their flesh turning to stone and veins forming new rivers.

majorIds.Lifestream: +Lifestream: Blood Sorrow deals 450% and grants 4 times the overhealth, but shortens its duration by 75%.

after.lore: The power to join oneself with the lifeblood of the earth has long eluded sects of fanatical druids and shamans. One such cult found a way, and subsequently wiped itself out in the process, their flesh turning to stone and veins forming new rivers.

majorIds.Efflorescence: +Efflorescence: Jasmine Bloom deals 25% and 25% at the cost of 6 blocks of vertical range. Swan Dive with a maximum size Jasmine Bloom deals 50% and 50%.

before.lore: The most dangerous enemy is one you cannot see. Hidden amidst a flurry of petals comes an avalanche of blows, in one moment dissolving mountains and forests into a growing amalgam, leaving a wake of vibrant bloom in the next.

majorIds.Efflorescence: +Efflorescence: Jasmine Bloom deals 25% and 25% at the cost of 6 blocks of vertical range. Swan Dive deals 16% and 16%.

after.lore: The most dangerous enemy is one you cannot see. Hidden amidst a flurry of petals comes an avalanche of blows, in one moment dissolving mountains and forests into a growing amalgam, leaving a wake of vibrant bloom in the next.

before.lore: "It's all doomed anyway. If you don't care, nothing can hurt you." - Zamugnia, Lost Lutho Citizen

after.lore: "It's all doomed anyway. If you don't care, nothing can hurt you."

"How perfect can a form be? The creatures here are warped. Distorted. their flesh bubbles and oozes with the most toxic of acids. But it makes them powerful. Resilient. Perhaps it would be better to become one of them. Perhaps it would make your form . . . perfect."

majorIds.Greed: +Greed: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 8% max health.
+Greed: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 8% max health.

after.lore: "They tear the earth open day after day after day, ripping out her most precious and vital stones, and dumping them into the abyss of their hungry, bottomless coffers. They would sell out the world for a bit of cash; after all, these stones bleed green."

"In the days before they ripped out its heart, there was a pulse to these streets: the sanguine flow of life through the sturdy buildings and cobbled roads and hidden alleys. What remains is a bloodless husk, dusty walls populated solely by those hideous things which can only see and never know."

"The feeling begins as a prickle on the neck. Is that tree staring? What does it see? How much does it know? This place is not right. It sees too much. It knows too much. The forest is staring at you. It burns the secrets out of you through its awful, unnatural retinas. There is nowhere to hide."

before.lore: Unruly magics of void and darkness are tamed within this bow's string. While those energies are never to be released, arrows fired from it fire at such blinding speeds so as to phase out of existence when they hit their target.

after.lore: Unruly magics of void and darkness are tamed within this bow's string. While those energies are never to be released, arrows fired from it fire at such blinding speeds so as to phase out of existence when they hit their target.

majorIds.Phoenix-Born: +Phoenix-Born: Health Regeneration is increased by 1% for every 1% Health missing.

before.lore: From the ashes, let a hero rise anew.

majorIds.Phoenix-Born: +Phoenix-Born: Health Regeneration is increased by 0.75% for every 1% Health missing.

after.lore: From the ashes, let a hero rise anew.

majorIds.Self-sufficient: +Self-sufficient: Powder Specials can no longer be charged manually, but accumulate 7% charge every second.

before.lore: This pendant is not much more than a battery on a string, but a curious combination of Avos and electromagic seem to have left it with the ability to charge power from its surroundings on its own.

majorIds.Self-sufficient: +Self-sufficient: Powder Specials can no longer be charged manually, but accumulate 8% charge every second.

after.lore: This pendant is not much more than a battery on a string, but a curious combination of Avos and electromagic seem to have left it with the ability to charge power from its surroundings on its own.

majorIds.Escape Route: +Escape Route: Frenzy and Time Dilation charge twice as fast, but to a halved maximum.
+Escape Route: Frenzy and Time Dilation charge twice as fast but also decay twice as fast.

majorIds.Lustrate: +Lustrate: Heal restores health at a slower rate, but Searing Light deals +80%, +40%, and +10%.
+Lustrate: Heal restores health at a slower rate, but Searing Light deals +150%.

majorIds.Hellfire: +Hellfire: Bash is replaced by a single hit, gaining +3 radius and dealing 225%, 40%, and 60%. Boiling Blood's cooldown is set to 2s, gains +40%, +50%, and burns twice as fast for 1s, but can't slow.

before.lore: To forge a weapon such as this from the cursed lava of the portal basin requires dozens, for each smith would lose themselves to the force of corruption before it is finished. The nightmarishly hooked blade serves no purpose but destruction, as intended.

majorIds.Hellfire: +Hellfire: Bash is replaced by a single hit, gaining +3 radius and dealing +85%, +10%, and +60%. Boiling Blood's cooldown is set to 2s, gains +40%, +50%, and burns twice as fast for 1s, but can't slow.

after.lore: To forge a weapon such as this from the cursed lava of the portal basin requires dozens, for each smith would lose themselves to the force of corruption before it is finished. The nightmarishly hooked blade serves no purpose but destruction, as intended.

before.lore: Reconstructed from mere wooden scraps of its former self, this extremely heavy crossbow still contains immense power. It was intended for use with a lost suit of armor, of which only one piece remains.

after.lore: Reconstructed from mere wooden scraps of its former self, this extremely heavy crossbow still contains immense power. It was intended for use with a lost suit of armor, of which only one piece remains.

majorIds.Brachiate: +Brachiate: Grappling Hook has 25% increased range and increased velocity, but no longer pulls enemies.

before.lore: King of the Jungle—it's a title reserved for the apex of the apex, and yet from where you swing across the canopy, this beast of supposed royalty is but another victim of your thievish pursuits.

majorIds.Brachiate: +Brachiate: Grappling Hook has 25% increased range and increased velocity.

after.lore: King of the Jungle—it's a title reserved for the apex of the apex, and yet from where you swing across the canopy, this beast of supposed royalty is but another victim of your thievish pursuits.

majorIds.Fright or Flight: +Fright or Flight: Plays spooky tunes.
+Fright or Flight: Plays spooky tunes.

majorIds.Lustrate: +Lustrate: Heal restores health at a slower rate, but Searing Light deals +80%, +40%, and +10%.

before.lore: The light refracted through this sceptre shows you visions. You see the endless waves reflected in its rainbows, cracking hulls and drowning towns. This prism allows you to channel a fraction of the sea's potential.

majorIds.Lustrate: +Lustrate: Heal restores health at a slower rate, but Searing Light deals +150%.

after.lore: The light refracted through this sceptre shows you visions. You see the endless waves reflected in its rainbows, cracking hulls and drowning towns. This prism allows you to channel a fraction of the sea's potential.

majorIds.Escape Route: +Escape Route: Frenzy and Time Dilation charge twice as fast, but to a halved maximum.
+Escape Route: Frenzy and Time Dilation charge twice as fast but also decay twice as fast.

before.lore: "Bandit attacks losing you sleep? Free fighting classes here! Only 10  emeralds- they won't know what hit 'em!" -Almuj Self-Defense Class Advertisement

after.lore: "Bandit attacks losing you sleep? Free fighting classes here! Only 10 emeralds- they won't know what hit 'em!" -Almuj Self-Defense Class Advertisement

Nothing stands out about these thin greaves at a glance. But sometimes, when the time is right, a tempestuous power rushes through them: your legs moving as by themselves, and taking leaps that they should never be able to.

before.lore: "I swear on my life those spiders were covered in spikes! Go out there, see if I'm wrong!" -Suri, Elemental Researcher

after.lore: "I swear on my life those spiders were covered in spikes! Go out there, see if I'm wrong!" -Suri, Elemental Researcher
